PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE JILL MIRIAM COPELAND, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario.
